actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that a woman may simultaneously receive (without any reduction or offset) both an old-age or disability insurance benefit and a widow's insurance benefit.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that a woman may simultaneously receive (without any reduction or offset) both an old-age or disability insurance benefit and a widow's insurance benefit under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors' and Disability Insurance).

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that a woman may simultaneously receive (without any reduction or offset) both an old-age or disability insurance benefit and a widow's insurance benefit.
